com.gocardless.services

Class CreditorBankAccountService.CreditorBankAccountDisableRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gocardless.http.PostRequest<CreditorBankAccount>
      • com.gocardless.services.CreditorBankAccountService.CreditorBankAccountDisableRequest
  • Enclosing class:
    CreditorBankAccountService

    public static final class CreditorBankAccountService.CreditorBankAccountDisableRequest
extends PostRequest<CreditorBankAccount>

    Request class for CreditorBankAccountService.disable(java.lang.String).

    Immediately disables the bank account, no money can be paid out to a disabled account.

    This will return a disable_failed error if the bank account has already been disabled.

    A disabled bank account can be re-enabled by creating a new bank account resource with the same details.
